casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

September 7, 2007

[Cite as 09/07/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-4598.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-0035. Turner v. Ohio Bell Tel. Co.

Cuyahoga App. No. 87541, 2006-Ohio-6168. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of the motion of amici curiae The Ohio Edison Company, The Cleveland Electric Illuminating Company, The Toledo Edison Company and FirstEnergy Corp. to participate in oral argument,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
